A

AbstractColorStrategy - Class in it.seba.juno.player
Abstract implementation for the color strategy used by Npc players in game, using the color strategy, the Npc player decide which color choose when drop a card that permit to switch to a new color for the discard pile.
AbstractColorStrategy() - Constructor for class it.seba.juno.player.AbstractColorStrategy
 
AbstractDropStrategy - Class in it.seba.juno.player
Abstract implementation for the drop strategy used by Npc players in game, using the drop strategy the Npc player decide which card drop to discard pile.
AbstractDropStrategy(DiscardPile) - Constructor for class it.seba.juno.player.AbstractDropStrategy
Class Constructor.
AbstractPlayer - Class in it.seba.juno.player
The abstract implementation of the player, contains methods valid both for npc and human players.

addToPlayList(String, String) - Method in class it.seba.juno.manger.AudioManager
Add a sound to play list, sound is loaded into memory so that when the manager play doesn't need to read it from disk.
AudioManager - Class in it.seba.juno.manger
Provide a way to play sound in game, started from code present in UniTelma, implemented using singleton pattern.
